```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(widyr)
library(ggthemes)
library(langcog)
library(ggdendro)
theme_set(papaja::theme_apa())
```

```{r}
load("../saved_data/lang_coefs.RData")
```

```{r}
lang_coefs <- lang_coefs %>%
  mutate(language = str_replace(language, " \\(.*\\)", ""))

coef_cors <- function(coefs) {
  suppressWarnings(
    coefs %>%
      group_by(measure, interaction) %>%
      nest() %>%
      mutate(cors = map(data, ~pairwise_cor(.x, language, term, estimate))) %>%
      select(-data) %>%
      unnest() %>%
      rename(language1 = item1, language2 = item2)
  )
}

cor_clust <- function(d) {
  d %>%
    spread(language2, correlation) %>%
    as.data.frame() %>%
    `rownames<-`(.$language1) %>%
    select(-language1) %>%
    dist() %>%
    hclust() %>%
    dendro_data(type = "triangle")
}

coef_clust <- lang_coefs %>%
  coef_cors() %>%
  group_by(measure, interaction) %>%
  nest() %>%
  mutate(clust = map(data, cor_clust))

save(coef_clust, file = "../saved_data/coef_clust.RData")
```

```{r}
baseline_sample <- function(i) {
  lang_coefs %>%
    group_by(interaction, measure, language) %>%
    mutate(estimate = sample(estimate)) %>%
    coef_cors() %>%
    mutate(sample = i)
}

num_samples <- 100
baseline_samples <- map_df(1:num_samples, baseline_sample)

baseline_coef_summary <- baseline_samples %>%
  group_by(interaction, measure, sample, language1) %>%
  summarise(correlation = mean(correlation)) %>%
  group_by(interaction, measure, language1) %>%
  summarise(mean_cor = mean(correlation),
            ci_lower_cor = ci_lower(correlation),
            ci_upper_cor = ci_upper(correlation)) %>%
  rename(language = language1) %>%
  mutate(language = fct_rev(language)) %>%
  filter(interaction == "main effect")

save(baseline_coef_summary, file = "../saved_data/baseline_coef_summary.RData")
```

```{r}
coef_summary <- lang_coefs %>%
  coef_cors() %>%
  group_by(measure, interaction, language1) %>%
  summarise(mean_cor = mean(correlation)) %>%
  rename(language = language1) %>%
  mutate(language = fct_rev(language)) %>%
  filter(interaction == "main effect")

save(coef_summary, file = "../saved_data/coef_summary.RData")
```
